attributes.review: I don’t usually do this but about a week after I downloaded the app (just for general info) they started to take my info from my phone im pretty sure. I started receiving mail, calls, and ads. That kind of stuff creeps me out because I never gave them my address😑
attributes.title: review

attributes.review: We don’t really need this in the App Store. People who want to watch this orange man can go on the news. We don’t wanna see a app filled with him. To be completely honest he IS NOT my president it’s a free country and we should not be controlled by someone who doesn’t care. So yes I have this review because better apps can replace it.
attributes.title: ✨spam✨

attributes.review: I wanted to download this to see why I should vote for him , when I opened the app it was glitchy and it ran SOOOO slow I sat there for 30+ minutes waiting for it to load & then it crashed after 30 minutes don’t download the app 😾 DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME so it’s gets 0/5 but I have to put a 1 star
attributes.title: It’s horrible 😢

attributes.review: Here I thought this would help see what’s going on for the campaigns but no the app is terrible. It’s hard to find information, annoying to navigate, and overall just a total let down. I’d rate it 0 stars if it’d let me, a waste of phone space.
attributes.title: ✨Absolutely a waste of time✨

attributes.review: This app is a piece of crap. It took up all of the space on my phone so all of my other apps glitched like crazy. My phone started dying super fast and randomly turning off. When i realized it was this app i deleted it and everything went back to normal. 0/10 would recommend. 👎🏼👎🏼
attributes.title: THIS APP IS CRAP!!!!

attributes.review: i decided to get this app so i could support mr. orange. immediately i noticed something was wrong, it asked me what my sexual orientation was when i answered my phone went ballistic. scared i deleted the app but that didn’t stop it. a random number texted me my address telling me they were coming. soon mike pence was outside dressed in white cloth and a hood, very ugly fashion sense. he kidnapped me and brought me to a camp where i met my wife. we escaped. don’t buy this app your basic human needs and need to feel equal will be violated. can’t support this. it’s a no from me mr. orange.
attributes.title: i was kidnapped

attributes.review: This app would crash every time I would open it :/// I was really excited to hear from God himself Donald J Trump directly thorough the speakers of my phone but I guess he hates us because it continues to crash. Donny baby please give us a better app! I just want to have you close to me!
attributes.title: Crashed when I opened?

attributes.review: First I was greeted by the DEVIL and by then I was already CRYING but then the worst thing I ever Thought of was Donald trump right In front of the screen and then I fell off my loft bed and was in a coma FOR A YEAR then I work up and I got on my phone AND THERE WAS DONLD TRUMP and then I started crying for a year and never stopped thank you for your time😙✌️🧚🏻🧚🏼🧚🏽🧚🏾🧚🏿🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️✨✨✨✨✨✨🪐✨🪐✨✨✨⚡️☄️⭐️☄️🌏🌟⭐️🪐🪐✨🌟✨
attributes.title: This app made me CRY 😗✌️

attributes.review: I downloaded it expecting to get the best words from real news and all I got was bad words and fake news. Some cheeto keeps saying rude, mean and hateful things. And as an American, this is not what I signed up for. App always crashed and was slow, really just a terrible experience
attributes.title: Unfun, not good, not the best words

attributes.review: worse app ever. it made my car throw up and my feet spray water! 😱 every time I open the app I have to see an orange cheeto puff 😣 now I can’t see since that cheeto puff made me lose my eye sight.😰 i would rather get any other app this app. awful most worse app ever. anyways what y’all want from chick fil a? 😹✌🏼
attributes.title: this app can give u stds 😖
